name: Bottle Flipping Challenge 2k17
description:
Game For (RED).

Flip the bottle onto the platform to score.
Can you master the Bottle Flip?

Tap to Flip the bottle, land it upright and see how far you can go! Get to the top of the leaderboard and show the world your talent! Download Flip The Bottle now and start flipping the bottles!

-Many different bottle styles to unlock.
- Free Backgrounds in game
- Gamecenter leaderboard to test your skills agains players around the globe

* No Internet Connection Required *

Like Fanpage: https://facebook.com/StudioGameFree
Thank you so much.
